snippet: Kristin Chenoweth, Steve Harvey, Jimmy Kimmel, John Krasinski, Jason Mraz and Lily Tomlin are among the performers who will pay tribute to Ellen DeGeneres when she receives the Mark Twain Prize for American Humor on Oct. 22.
abstract: Kristin Chenoweth, Steve Harvey, Jimmy Kimmel, John Krasinski, Jason Mraz and Lily Tomlin are among the performers who will pay tribute to Ellen DeGeneres when she receives the Mark Twain Prize for American Humor on Oct. 22.

headline.main: Roster of Stars to Celebrate Twain Prize for Ellen DeGeneres

keywords.value: Kennedy, John F, Center for the Performing Arts
